alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 10:02PM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Snow showers develop Friday morning and continue into Saturday morning, with the heaviest snow Friday evening into early Saturday. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Eagar-Springerville, Forest Lakes and Heber- Overgaard. * WHEN...From 5 AM Friday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute, as well as any New Year`s Eve travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Snow forecast from 5 AM Friday to 11 AM Saturday: Eagar-Sprgrvlle 3 to 5 inches Forest Lakes 9 to 15 inches Heber-Overgaard 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County
